name: Escape the Dungeon (Saidus)
description:
Explore the eerie dungeon and meet the goblins! This will test your patience as you guide your hero and escape the dungeon!

The game is still in progress, more features to come! I hope you'll like the game, playing my game will help me a lot, and feedback will help too! Cheers! 

 INSTRUCTIONS:

* Press the big button to drop dynamite!

* Move the player using the Joystick Control!
